body.p: Your petitioner Jas Anderson of color states that at the present term of the Mercer Circuit Court he was find fifty Dollars in the case of the Com vs himself & others That sd fine was imposed upon him for having a fight with some other persons of color, Your petitioner states that he is now confined in the Jail of Mercer Co for the payment of sd fine, and that he is verry poor and has a wife and six children dependent on him for support. He therefore prays yoru Excellency to remit such portions of sd find as is coming to the Commonwealth
We the undersigned citizens of Mercer Co unite in the prayer of the above petitioner.

P. B. Thompson Jr att at law
John H. Fairman Town Marshall
R F Corman D C
Geo. O. Herndon
Robert Gallagher Jailor of M Co
W D James Depety Shriff
H F James S M C
J. W. Cardwell

Mercer Cir Ct
vs
Jas Anderson
$50
